purpleculture_pinyin:
tán
surname Tan; variant of 谈
фамилия Тан; вариант разговора
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 谭)
Pictophonetic: 覃 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
譚嗣同 [ tán sì tóng ]: Tan Sitong (1865-1898), Qing writer and politician, one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
譚盾 [ tán dùn ]: Tan Dun (1957-) Chinese composer
譚詠麟 [ tán yǒng lín ]: Alan Tam (1950-), Hong Kong Canto-pop singer and actor
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 覃 [ tán ] to reach, to spread to; deep, extensive
heisig_chinese_memo: In the western USA, it's always sunny, so you can have words with you company about getting a sick day so you can get up early and lay outside for some sunshine and a tan.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the early western (覃) words (言) are a talk
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the western USA, it's always sunny, so you can have words with you company about getting a sick day so you can get up early and lay outside for some sunshine and a tan.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yan " to " tan " sound. " Tan " means expansion. "Jade articles. Yan Bu: "Tan, Da Ye." Such as "Da Dai Li Ji. "Zi Zhang asked to be an official": "Fu Gong has an instinct, and he has a long-term career." Wang Pinzhen explained: ""Guang Yun": "Tan, Da Ye." The industry is calm and arrogant."

" Tan " means extension and extension. Such as "Pipe. "Extravagance": "I don't know it, but sacrifice to the second ancestor of Tan." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Tan, Yan Ye. The failure of the country to sacrifice, extends to the second phase." Yu Xingwu "Shuangjian Yu Zhuzi New Proof." "Guan Zi 2": "The note means "Extend to the second ancestor", and read "Tan" as "Tan".

" Tan " is used as " talk " to express discussion. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Zeyang": "Why don't the master slander me to the king?" Lu Deming explained: "Tan, this book is also for discussion." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Fang Ji Chuan": "The Chang Tan of this old life."

" Tan " is also the name of an ancient country, east of Jinan City, Shandong Province. "Zuo Zhuan. "The Ten Years of Zhuanggong": "Qi Hou also passed through Tan, but Tan was not courteous. When he entered, all the princes celebrated, but Tan did not come. In winter, Qi Master will destroy Tan, but Tan is not courteous.

" Tan " is often used as a surname. "Tong Chi. The Second Clan": "Tan family, Viscount. (Zhuang) Gong died ten years ago. Today, there is an ancient city of Tan in Licheng, Qizhou. The descendants regard the country as their clan."
humanum_short_description_en: From " yan " to " tan " sound. " Tan " can mean enlargement, extension, discussion, etc., and later used as a surname.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「覃」聲。「譚」表示擴大。《玉篇．言部》：「譚，大也。」如《大戴禮記．子張問入官》：「富恭有本能圖，修業居久而譚。」王聘珍解詁：「《廣韻》：『譚，大也。』業安於久而自大也。」

　　「譚」表示延及、延伸。如《管子．侈靡》：「不稱而祀譚次祖。」尹知章注：「譚，延也。國敗絕祀之事，延及次相。」于省吾《雙劍誃諸子新證．管子二》：「注謂『延及次祖』，是讀『譚』為『覃』，訓延也。『次祖』猶言列祖。」

　　「譚」通作「談」，表示談論。如《莊子．則陽》：「夫子何不譚我於王？」陸德明釋文：「譚，本亦作談。」《三國志．魏書．方伎傳》：「此老生之常譚。」

　　「譚」也是古國名，在今山東省濟南市以東。《左傳．莊公十年》：「齊侯之出也，過譚，譚不禮焉。及其入也，諸侯皆賀，譚又不至。冬，齊師滅譚，譚無禮也。」

　　「譚」後多用作姓氏。《通志．氏族略二》：「譚氏，子爵。（莊）公十年，齊滅之。今齊州歷城有古譚城。子孫以國為氏。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「覃」聲。「譚」可表示擴大、延及、談論等，後多用作姓氏。

譚 (Simplified: 谭)
Pinyin: tán
English Definition: surname Tan; variant of 谈
Total strokes: 19; Radical: 言
Pictophonetic: 覃 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 覃 [ tán ] to reach, to spread to; deep, extensive
Example Words:
譚嗣同 [ tán sì tóng ]: Tan Sitong (1865-1898), Qing writer and politician, one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
譚盾 [ tán dùn ]: Tan Dun (1957-) Chinese composer
譚詠麟 [ tán yǒng lín ]: Alan Tam (1950-), Hong Kong Canto-pop singer and actor

從「 言 」，「 覃 」聲。「 譚 」表示擴大。《玉篇．言部》：「譚，大也。」如《大戴禮記．子張問入官》：「富恭有本能圖，修業居久而譚。」王聘珍解詁：「《廣韻》：『譚，大也。』業安於久而自大也。」 「 譚 」表示延及、延伸。如《管子．侈靡》：「不稱而祀譚次祖。」尹知章注：「譚，延也。國敗絕祀之事，延及次相。」于省吾《雙劍誃諸子新證．管子二》：「注謂『延及次祖』，是讀『譚』為『覃』，訓延也。『次祖』猶言列祖。」 「 譚 」通作「 談 」，表示談論。如《莊子．則陽》：「夫子何不譚我於王？」陸德明釋文：「譚，本亦作談。」《三國志．魏書．方伎傳》：「此老生之常譚。」 「 譚 」也是古國名，在今山東省濟南市以東。《左傳．莊公十年》：「齊侯之出也，過譚，譚不禮焉。及其入也，諸侯皆賀，譚又不至。冬，齊師滅譚，譚無禮也。」 「 譚 」後多用作姓氏。《通志．氏族略二》：「譚氏，子爵。（莊）公十年，齊滅之。今齊州歷城有古譚城。子孫以國為氏。」

Liushutong characters (20)

譚字的基本解释

譚
tán
见“谭”。

譚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tán］
［《廣韻》徒含切，平賈，定。］
［《廣韻》徒感切，上感，定。］
“谭1”的繁体字。
(1)延及。
(2)连属，接连不断。参见“參3譚”。
(3)光大。
(4)古国名。在今山东省济南市东龙山镇附近。公元前684年为齐桓公所灭。
(5)通“覃”。深沉貌。参见“譚思”。
(6)同“談”。谈说，称说。
(7)同“談”。话语。
(8)姓。南朝宋有谭金。见《宋书·宗越传》。

譚字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譚； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1182第05
【廣韻】【正韻】徒含切【集韻】【韻會】徒南切，?音覃。【玉篇】大也，誕也，著也。【大戴禮·子張問入官】修業居久而譚。【註】謂安縱也。【成公綏·嘯賦】參譚雲屬。【註】譚，猶著也。參譚，不絕。　又國名。【春秋·莊十年】譚子奔莒。【杜註】譚國在濟南平陵縣西南。　又姓。譚子之後。【後漢·逸民傳】太原譚賢。　又【正韻】與談同。【魏志·管輅傳】此老生之常譚。【莊子·則陽篇】夫子何不譚我于王。　又通作覃。【詩·大雅】實覃實訏。【鄭箋】覃或作譚。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?徒感切，覃上聲。亦大也。　又叶徒黃切，音唐。【急就章】曹富貴，尹李桑。蕭彭祖，屈宗譚。　【說文】本作〈言?〉。

譚字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
譚字的起名意思

暂无。

Tan
Basic explanation of words
Tan
tán

Tan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tán］
["Guangyun" Tu Hanqie, Pingjia, Ding. ]
["Guangyun" has a strong sense of appetite, sense of supremacy, and determination. ]
Traditional characters for "谭1".
(1) Extend.
(2) Be affiliated, one after another. See "Chen 3 Tan".
(3) Everbright.
(4) Ancient country name. Near Donglongshan Town, Jinan City, Shandong Province. It was destroyed by Qi Huan in 684 BC.
(5) Through "Tin". Deep appearance. See "Tan Si".
(6) Same as "talk". Talk about it, say it.
(7) Same as "talk". Discourse.
(8) Last name. There was Tan Jin in the Southern Song Dynasty. See "Song Shu·Zong Yue Biography".
Tan
